subtitle: Tuna and sweetcorn in a batter mix, deep-fried.

method.text: Heat the oil in a pan. Add the onion and garlic. Fry for 2-3 min or until softened. Add tomatoes, tomato puree and seasoning, bring to the boil then simmer for 8-10 min or until thickened slightly.

Meanwhile, melt the butter and water together then bring to the boil. On boiling, remove from heat. Pour in the flour and beat together vigorously until mixture is smooth and forms into a ball in the centre of the pan. Leave to cool slightly.
Beat in the salt and eggs, a little at a time, adding only enough to give a piping consistency. Stir in the cheese, sweetcorn, tuna, tomato sauce, seasoning and parsley.
Heat enough oil to come no more than half-way up a pan to 190°C. Drop teaspoonfuls of the mixture into the oil and fry for 3-5 min. Drain thoroughly on kitchen paper. Serve with the tomato sauce.

title: Cheesy tuna aigrettes with tomato sauce
